org.apache.nutch.indexer

Class NutchField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.indexer.NutchField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Writable

    public class NutchField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Writable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class represents a multi-valued field with a weight. Values are arbitrary objects.
